"Trong vòng 1-2 n_m tr_ l_i _ây, Gamification _ã và _ang tr_ thành m_t “buzz-words” trong nhi_u l_nh v_c khác nhau nh_ marketing, product design, software product development, th_m chí trong c_ qu_n l_ và _i_u hành doanh nghi_p. Có th_ nói m_t cách __n gi_n, Gamification là vi_c _ng d_ng các thành ph_n c_a game vào trong các l_nh v_c khác bên ngoài Game industry. C_ th_ h_n, vi_c áp d_ng các l_ thuy_t thi_t k_ game vào thi_t k_ ph_n m_m, xây d_ng v_n hóa doanh nghi_p, marketing v_i m_c tiêu mang l_i l_i ích tích c_c nh_ khuy_n khích khách hàng tiêu dùng, g_n k_t ng__i dùng v_i các _ng d_ng ph_n m_m c_ng nh_ các website hay các mobile app.
N_u m_t s_n ph_m ph_n m_m ___c làm ra ch_ v_i nh_ng tính n_ng ph_c v_ business thì ng__i dùng s_ ch_ s_ d_ng nó khi ng__i ta c_n, ho_c khi ng__i ta “bu_c ph_i làm vi_c” v_i _ng d_ng ph_n m_m _ó. Ng__c l_i, n_u các ch__ng trình ph_n m_m máy tính, mobile app, các ch__ng trình marketing có c_ ch_ khuy_n khích, lôi kéo khách hàng tham gia và g_n bó lâu dài thì ng__i dùng s_ dành nhi_u th_i gian __ tham gia v_i s_ h_ng kh_i và t_n su_t __u __n. Nh_ v_y, m_c _ích c_a Gamification khá rõ ràng, v_i m_t s_ tiêu chí c_n b_n nh_ sau:
__ G_n k_t v_i ng__i dùng, khách hàng t_t h_n.

"THE 7 BEST PROJECT MANAGEMENT MOBILE APPS OF 2015Project managers continue to advance as invaluable resources to businesses of all sizes. They are information powerhouses and masters at planning, facilitating, scheduling, communicating and conflict resolution. With workforces becoming increasingly mobile, project managers also require access to powerful project management mobile apps to streamline and simplify PM processes.With so many mobile apps out there, it’s difficult to determine which ones are best for your company. Here are seven of best project management apps, their features, capabilities and pricing.1. Asana: is available on Android and iOS platforms and features high-level views of projects through dashboards, the capability for project managers to share projects with smaller groups within a team2. Clarizen: has robust scalablePM software,available on Android and iOS platforms. It offers project portfolio management, project planning, document management, templates, resource management, change request and case management, social collaboration, task management, budget and expense management, email collaboration using Clarizen InterAct, risk management and Clarizen Panels.3. LiquidPlanner: According to LiquidPlanner CEO Liz Pearce, “There are few jobs in the world today that are as complex and dynamic as project management.4. Mavenlink
Mavenlink’s PM app is also accessible via Android and iOS platforms, specializes in the professional services market, and its PM software offers resource planning, project accounting and advanced business intelligence capabilities.5. Podio
Podio has developed a small business-friendly and easy-to-use project management app that also works with Android and iOS platforms6. Trello
Trello is available on Android and iOS platforms also and accommodates individuals, as well small and medium-size businesses.7. Zoho Project
Zoho Proje"

Mentioning Bitcoin, Ethereum,... many people may think about the technology behind them - Blockchain. It is an emerging technology that attracts a great deal of attention. In a digital economy, Blockchain technology is considered a revolution in the internet world, helping the e-commerce activities become safer and more cost-effective. Not any single day goes by without some news about blockchain, for example, how JP Morgan is hugely investing into researching blockchain technology, how blockchain is used for e-voting, or many big players in the tech fields such as Microsoft, IBM and even large banks are in the race to be pioneers in mastering and applying this technology. // Nh_c __n Bitcoin, Ethereum… nhi_u ng__i s_ bi_t công ngh_ __ng sau _ó là Blockchain, công ngh_ m_i nh_t hi_n nay. Trong n_n kinh t_ s_, công ngh_ Blockchain có th_ ví nh_ m_t cu_c cách m_ng Internet __ giúp các ho_t __ng th__ng m_i _i_n t_ an toàn và ti_t ki_m chi phí h_n. Các tin t_c c_p nh_t v_ Blockchain _ang ngày càng nhi_u, ví d_ JP Morgan _ang __u t_ m_nh m_ vào nghiên c_u công ngh_ này, Blockchain ___c s_ d_ng trong b_u c_ tr_c tuy_n nh_ th_ nào, hay nh_ng hãng l_n nh_ Microsoft, IBM, và c_ nh_ng ngân hàng l_n _ang ch_y _ua __ tiên phong s_ h_u và áp d_ng công ngh_ Blockchain.Let’s discover and discuss about the Blockchain technology and its potential as a distributed database that secures transparency and “democracy” in the "BLOCKCHAIN TECHNOLOGY & ITS IMPLICATIONS FOR BUSINESS" workshop // Hãy cùng tìm hi_u và trao __i v_ Công ngh_ Blockchain c_ng nh_ ti_m n_ng c_a Blockchain v_i vai trò m_t ph__ng th_c truy_n tin mã hoá __m b_o s_ minh b_ch và “dân ch_" tuy_t __i t_i H_i th_o "CÔNG NGH_ BLOCKCHAIN & NH_NG TÁC __NG T_I KINH DOANH".

"The next several months, I will complete my e-commerce(*) business plan in detail. To pull it off , I am finding out new partners who think big, being professional in one of many different fields as software (language programming, artificial intelligence, big data..), finance, marketing, .. almost unlimited number of management positions; CTO, CFO, CEO..
1. Please send your CV to deekaucompany@gmail.com. You can use a fake name if you are not sure about security and reputation . All your information is classified. The most important factor is your capability to help us become a unicorn.
2. Video conferencing. We know some personal information and business each other.
3. Non-disclosure and confidentiality agreement. The term “Confidential Information” as used in this Agreement shall mean any data or information in my business plan that is competitively sensitive material and not generally known to the public.
4. Send my business plan to you.
5. Negotiation. You become a partner and shareholder in the company.
6. Finding investors. We work part-time or full-time to implement the plan. Raising $1 million(**) for the first 3-to-5-year process.
7. Set up the startup.
(*) The word: E-commerce isn’t defined anywhere on the internet
(**) The number may be changed."

"C_m nang h__ng d_n cho các Giám __c CNTT v_ cloud computing (The CIO's Guide to Cloud Computing)M_t c_m nang h__ng d_n tóm t_t v_ cloud computing h_u ích cho các nhà qu_n l_ v_ Công ngh_ thông tin (CNTT) (IT) trong các doanh nghi_p bao g_m:

2) Th_ tr__ng cloud trên th_ gi_i th_ nào? (Cloud market)

"Báo cáo Xu h__ng _ng d_ng cloud ERP trên th_ gi_i 2016
(Research Report on the global Cloud ERP Adoption in 2016)Trong m_t báo cáo nghiên c_u th_ tr__ng m_i nh_t c_a công ty T_ v_n Panorama Consulting (USA) v_ _ng d_ng các gi_i pháp qu_n tr_ doanh nghi_p (ERP) n_m 2016 (bao g_m các gi_i pháp cloud ERP) (v_i 215 doanh nghi_p _ M_, _a ph_n là cách doanh nghi_p s_n xu_t (55%), trong _ó g_n 70% doanh nghi_p có doanh s_ t_ nh_ h_n 25 tri_u USD l_n __n 1 t_ USD).N_m 2016 là n_m có t_ng tr__ng _áng k_ __i v_i các gi_i pháp cloud ERP (27% doanh nghi_p ch_n cloud ERP vào 2016 so v_i 11% doanh nghi_p vào n_m 2015) và th_c t_ có h_n 55% doanh nghi_p tham gia kh_o sát _ã _ng d_ng cloud ERP. M_t trong nh_ng l_ do chính các doanh nghi_p ch_n cloud ERP là vi_c ti_t ki_m chi phí, __c bi_t có th_ ti_t ki_m __n 20% chi phí tri_n khai so v_i chi phí tri_n khai ERP truy_n th_ng.M_t con s_ _áng l_u _ là các doanh nghi_p _ M_ (tham gia nghiên c_u này) dành 6,5% doanh thu hàng n_m cho vi_c __u t_ vào h_ th_ng ERP (so v_i n_m 2015 là 5,9%). M_t con s_ tham kh_o cho các doanh nghi_p _ th_ tr__ng m_i n_i nh_ Vi_t Nam, Cambodia, v.v...Các công ty v_ gi_i pháp ERP hàng __u th_ gi_i là SAP, Oracle, Microsoft, Infor & Epicor v_n là nh_ng gi_i pháp ___c ch_n l_a quen thu_c, trong _ó Microsoft (32%) v_n là _ng d_ng gi_i pháp ph_ bi_n cho các doanh nghi_p v_a và nh_ (SME), Oracle là 23% và SAP (20%) m_c dù SAP & Oracle luôn ___c __a vào danh sách xem xét __u tiên v_i t_ l_ 41% & 37%.Hi_n nay, các __i gia v_ công ngh_ nh_ SAP, Oracle, Microsoft, v.v... c_ng _ang c_nh tranh kh_c ki_t v_ gi_i pháp và công ngh_ cloud __ tr_ thành ng__i d_n __u th_ tr__ng.(B_ báo cáo __y __ có th_ t_i xu_ng t_ http://panorama-consulting.com/resource-ce…/2016-erp-report/ hoac inbox mình)"

"Th_ m_i tham d_ Meteor Meetup, có quà. Hoàn toàn mi_n phí nha Designveloper[HOT] CHANCE TO GET SPECIAL GIFTS AT 2nd METEOR HO CHI MINH MEETUP
Take your chance to get special gifts when taking part in our 2nd Meteor Ho Chi Minh Meetup. There will be presents for those do exactly these #4_following_steps:
- Like our page at https://www.facebook.com/designveloper
- Check in at Designveloper
- Share this post on your wall at public mode
- Tag 3 friends in comment box
Winners will be rewarded at Part 3 of our meetup. Hope to see you there.
Here is our schedule for the upcoming Meteor Meetup. Check it out!
Time: 9:30 AM – 11:30 PM
Place: Room 401 s& 402, No. 57 Le Thi Hong Gam, Nguyen Thai Binh, District 1, HCMC, Vietnam.
-------------------------------------------------
Part 1: Warm-up
Funny game in pair for about 15 minutes. You will be well-prepared for our informative presentations and hot discussions at Part 2.Part 2: Presentation and Discussion
Our experts in Full Stack Web and Mobile Developments will deliver presentations about these 2 below topics:
*** How to deploy and scale your apps with Meteor
You will come up with Deployment Architecture, Mongo Oplog, Mongo DB Replication, comparison between Meteor Up and Meteor Galaxy and more.
*** NoSQL Injection in Meteor.js applications
Regarding this topic, SQL and NoSQL Injection will be made clear to you. Then you will have time to have a look at our sample app – Meteor Shop and see how our developer works on it.Part 3: Game, Awards and Wefie with DesignveloperThere’s 2 day lefts #JOIN_US_FOR_FREE NOW at http://bit.ly/Meteor-meetup-July-2016."

"Vanilla Ice Cream that puzzled General motors’!!!!
An Interesting Story
Never underestimate your Clients' Complaint, no matter how funny it might seem!
This is a real story that happened between the customer of General Motors and its Customer-Care Executive. Pls read on.....
A complaint was received by the Pontiac Division of General Motors:
'This is the second time I have written to you, and I don't blame you for not answering me, because I sounded crazy, but it is a fact that we have a tradition in our family of Ice-Cream for dessert after dinner each night, but the kind of ice cream varies so, every night, after we've eaten, the whole family votes on which kind of ice cream we should have and I drive down to the store to get it. It's also a fact that I recently purchased a new Pontiac and since then my trips to the store have created a problem.....
You see, every time I buy a vanilla ice-cream, when I start back from the store my car won't start. If I get any other kind of ice cream, the car starts just fine. I want you to know I'm serious about this question, no matter how silly it sounds """What is there about a Pontiac that makes it not start when I get vanilla ice cream, and easy to start whenever I get any other kind?""" The Pontiac President was understandably skeptical about the letter, but sent an Engineer to check it out anyway.The latter was surprised to be greeted by a successful, obviously well educated man in a fine neighborhood. He had arranged to meet the man just after dinner time, so the two hopped into the car and drove to the ice cream store. It was vanilla ice cream that night and, sure enough, after they came back to the car, it wouldn't start.The Engineer returned for three more nights. The first night, they gotchocolate. The car started. The second night, he got strawberry. The car started. The third night he ordered vanilla. The car failed to"

Runs the IT organization, achieving IT operational excellence & providing effective, reliable servicesMore information:

"THE AI REVOLUTION: BY THE NUMBERSWhat does it look like when AI takes the world be storm?The following stats will give you an indication on the potential impact of the AI revolution, and how it’s already shaping the future of business thinking:- The number of AI startups has increased 14x since the year 2000
- The amount of investment in AI startups has increased 6x since 2000
- 15% of enterprises in 2018 already use AI, but 31% more will come on board in the next 12 months
- 72% of executives see AI as being the most significant future business advantage
- 84% of global businesses see AI as providing a competitive advantage
- 41% of consumers believe AI will improve their lives in some way
- By 2020, businesses using AI to drive consumer insights will see $1.2 trillion more per year than their less-informed competitors
- So while the AI revolution is not led by the identifiable face of a friendly (or antagonistic) robot in a physical form, experts agree that impact of AI on business will be profound.More detail: http://bit.ly/2IB5gZw"
